Function Documentation

bool getFileContent (  const char *  filename,
char *&  content,
uint32 *  fileSize = NULL
) 
 

Reads file content to a buffer.

Parameters:
filename the filename to load and read from
content a buffer that will be allocated and filled with file content
fileSize optional filesize to be returned
Returns:
true if the content was filled
